DOC.brief_title: Intervention Promote Weight Loss Latinas At-risk Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The goal propose research compare two evidence-based strategy prevent type 2 diabetes - promotora-led lifestyle intervention metformin - vs. usual care ( UC ) among Latinas `` real world '' set . The aim study 1 ) develop protocol-based , promotora-led lifestyle intervention ( PLI ) promote weight loss at-risk Latinas , assess feasibility ; 2 ) compare change weight cardiometabolic markers—hemoglobin A1C , fast lipid , blood pressure—from baseline 1 year at-risk Latinas randomly assign PLI group versus metformin usual care ( UC ) group ; 3 ) understand social cultural context surround weight-related behavior among Latinas at-risk diabetes . The investigator hypothesize Latinas assign PLI metformin great weight loss ( primary outcome ) great improvement cardiometabolic marker baseline 1 year randomize UC
